tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Sushma is a very experienced doctor and thoroughly examine her patient. She guides in a very appropriate way and is very diligent. I am glad that I chose her as my doctor and would definitely recommend her to anyone.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** **** ****** *** ****** ********* expert with very polite and caring attitude ,, very much satisfied after my laproscopic hystcromy

Just don't go there ...she did abortion in Max and asked us to take the specimen to her clinic for tests. She told staff in hospital that it's parents' wish not to get specimen checked in hospital. Money charged for tests was overwhelming even though hospital charged less than that but in all the confusion and circumstances you just don't bother to check anything and follow doctor blindly. 

She even asked hospital staff on why the patient is not taking insurance because the estimate for insurance was 4 times the normal cost if you pay by cash.

*** *** ****** * *** ****** ******* ** ******* ** **** * **** *** ******* **** * **** ** **** *** ********* ******* *************** She does ultrasound with consultation itself so you can guess what it is like...

Just don't fall into this trap - we were given reference of this doc by someone but turned out to be bad...

The Doctor appeared very sweet initially  instructed me to undergo D n C and endometrium biopsy** ******** *** ************* * **** ** **** **** * * * *** *** ******** ** ** **** *** ***** **** **** *********
My reports came normal still she said your reports are not normal and you should go for uterus removal as one of the option to rule out any possibbility of cervical cancer.

She did not paid attention to the issues I was facing post D  n C and was very cold,absolute change of behaviour.She insisted that I should visit her again after a weeks time .
Pls. do not visit her ,these doctors have their hidden targets to achieve at the cost of the Patients well being.

I strongly do not suggest any one to visit her.

She wrote several tests and she called me to her clinic for ultrasound there she wrote few more tests and asked me to get admitted, she did not write any initial medication.  Then I decided to consult with another doctor, then she said ******** *** ***** **** *** *********** *** it was case of urine infection only.  I strongly not recommend to visit her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Such a rude doctor. *** ***** **** ** *** ***** *********** Everything before delivery was ok according to the ultrasound reports of MAX Vaishali but she admitted the patient for delivery ******* ******* ***** *** ******** *** ***** *** *** then told us for emergency Ceserian delivery. And made pressure on us for the health of patient. * **** *** *** **** *** *** ***** ** ******* *** ********* ** ***** **** ** ******* ****** Such an rude doctor she is. *** *** *** **** ******** *** ****  *** *** *** ***** *** ********* ******* ******* *** **********  We only two used to visit her through whole pregnancy tenure, *** *** **** *** ********* ** **** ********** I strictly tell everyone not to visit her.

MY wife did not get her  periods since 3 months without any symptoms of pregnancy . So I visited Max hospital Vaishali and consulted Dr Sushma Dixit  and I was told that overy size of my wife is very small therefore hormons are not getting produced.

She gave the medicines and assured us that within 6 months overy size will b in normal and problem will be solved.

During those six months we visited max vaishali every month and she asked us to visit her clinic for ultrasound every time we visit max hospital.

There she was charging ultrasound charges @1000 which is very costly.

After six month when we went there she told that overy size will not be increased and my wife will not become mother .

She advised us for serogacy . We were disappointed and cried that night.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review: We are very satisfied with the suggestions given by her .she cooperated very well.Hope such guidance in future also.

I visited Dr. Sushma Dikhit first time for my wife's pregnancy. It was very pleasant experience.
She is so cool, calm and have good patience. I have consulted couple of more doctors earlier but was still in search of a good doctor who can give sufficient time and be calm in asking stupid questions.

It was a very positive feeling visiting her. She gave enough time to answer all our queries very very calmly. She is so soft spoken, that you will feel to share everything and that should be

Finally, I think we ended search of a good doctor to proceed consultation with.

Recommend patients to avoid this Dr.  Visited her at her residence come Clinic at Indrapuram   She Insisted that we get certain very expensive tests  done very next day at Max. Basic tests were done at her residence very same day. 
Medicines were given from her own pharmacy.
Luckily we had taken a second opinion. **** ** **** **** ********* ** ***** ******* ****** **** * ****** ******* ** ********** ** **** ** ****** ********** ** *** **** **** ********* * ********

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Don't ever go to her. She is very rude *** ************. I waited for an hour in the check up room and then she came and started asking me if I'm ms or mrs. I told her ms. She was very rude. She scared me. She checked my vagina and told me that I'm lying and I had sex. And asked me to get some test which was so expensive.

Dr. Shusma Dixit is best for consultation but if you are planning to go for NORMAL DILEVERY then please dont recommend any patient in  last week of pregnancy as she will surely go for a ceasrian delivery as they wroking just to take money.
I have seen almost 99 % pataient of dr shushma who were fit in there pregnancy time but then in last suhsma dont even bother to try for a normal delivery. .

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: Highly experienced doctor with a friendly nature and real smile. Always advise the convenient,economic and best solution to her patient. *** ** *** ** *** **** ************* ** ****** Her caring attitude and love nature differentiate her from other doctors & makes her a best choice of the patient. I would recommend her as a first preference for gynaecologist.
Doctor having great expertise in your profession. She cares patient like her family member. God Bless her. Her behave is also truly recommended. ****** **** ****** ** **** *****

review:
I am very thankful to Dr Sushma Dikhit She knows exactly how to treat and make sure you are fully satisfied!!!
Very supportive and experienced. I thank her from bottom of my heart for a accepting my case in short notice.

review: A doctor with excellence and motherly guidance. She is listens with Patience and treat with an expertise.
I’m thankful to Dr. Sushma Dikhit for giving me the most wonderful experince of my life. Highly recommend.
